alert.note: Alert for Anderson; Franklin; Henry; Scott; Shelby; Woodford (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 25 at 6:16PM EDT until August 25 at 6:45PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Louisville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Shelby County in central Kentucky... Northern Woodford County in central Kentucky... Scott County in central Kentucky... Northeastern Anderson County in central Kentucky... Southeastern Henry County in central Kentucky... Franklin County in central Kentucky... * Until 645 PM EDT. * At 616 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 8 miles east of New Castle to near Georgetown, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Georgetown, Frankfort, Lawrenceburg, Versailles, Midway, Stamping Ground, Longlick, Slickway, Farmdale and Moon Lake Estates. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail, damaging wind, and continuous cloud to ground lightning are occurring with these storms. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Anderson; Franklin; Henry; Scott; Shelby; Woodford
